name: PSO Optical Sight
discription: Model: PSO-1@A sniper optical sight intended for firing at small-sized or well-concealed targets. Installed using the dovetail mount, which is standard in Warsaw Pact countries.

name: PSO Optical Sight
discription: Model: PSO-3@A sniper optical sight intended for firing at small-sized or well-concealed targets. Installed using the dovetail mount, which is standard in Warsaw Pact countries.
